title: Prokaryote compared to Eukaryote 5 answer options

content.question: Which of the following are characteristic of both prokaryotic and eukaryotic cells?

choices.label: Cytoplasm and a well-defined nucleus surrounded by a membrane
Membranous sites of ATP synthesis, Golgi complex, and ribosomes
Cell wall, several chromosomes, and cytoplasm
Cell membrane, ribosomes, DNA, and RNA

content.answer: Cell membrane, ribosomes, DNA, and RNA
